name: Customizeable Glass Jewelry
description:
Beautiful glass pendants. Select from my available designs, or send me a jpeg photo file (Karameiaks at aim dot com) you would like made into a unique glass pendant. You can choose from 1" square, 1" flat circle (not pictured), domed irregular circle (daisy), 1 x 1 7/8" rectangle (not pictured). More sizes and shapes availble by request.

If you have a type of graphic in mind, let me know and I can put together some sample choices.

Each tile come with a glazed back that is water resistant not waterproof. You should remove it when showering or swimming.

Choose from an organza ribbon necklace with claw clasp or a ball chain

All products come in a beautiful organza bag ready for gift giving.

options.name: Add custom photo, graphic, or words

name: Layered Washer Charms
description:
Three washers hand stamped with "Faith Hope and Love." Bound with your choice of faux suede cord or ribbon (many colors available). This picture shows the letters uncolored. If you would like them black, I can do that or you can choose any sharpie color at home to color them in and wipe the residue with a baby wipe.

Due to the nature of hand stamping, there may be slight imperfections on each charm. This adds to the uniqueness of the piece.

All Products come in a beautiful organza bag ready for gift giving.

name: Bottle Cap Pendant
description:
Funky bottle caps turned into pendants. Choose from solid Red, Black, Blue or Silver caps with silver insides. Each one comes with an attached jump ring and ball chain in a coordinating color.

Design of your choice from graphics, abstracts, or custom pictures.

If you would like one of your own pictures send me a jpeg image at Karameiaks at aim dot com.

All products come in a beautiful organza bag ready for gift giving.

name: Custom Washer Charms
description:
Choose your words for up to 3 washers. Letters will be hand stamped.


Due to the nature of hand stamping, there may be slight imperfections on each charm. This adds to the uniqueness of the piece.


Choose from faux suede cord or ribbon.
Optional heart or cross charm dangle available.

All products come in a beautiful organza bag ready for gift giving.
